arguments: webhook_url: str,channel: str,sender: str,text: str,icon_emoji: str = None
description: Send message to Slack channel using webhook. :param webhook_url: needs to be configured for the Slack server :param channel: channel needs to exist in the Slack server :param sender: shown in the message post as sender :param text: text for the message post :param icon_emoji: icon for the message post, defaults to None
